  specialized a doctor who specializes in the treatment of bones that have not grown correctly or that have been damaged: It may take six months to see an orthopedist for a hip replacement.
More examplesFewer examplesHe visited an orthopedist about his knee pain.The X-rays from my orthopedist showed bone growth after one month.He will be seen by the team's orthopedist later today.She is an orthopedist who has treated many retired footballers.
